potions.name: Potion
potions.description: Restores a Pokemon's HP by 20 points.

rare_candies.name: Rare Candy
rare_candies.description: Instantly levels up a Pokemon by one level.

tms.name: TM
tms.description: Teaches a new move to a Pokemon.

berries.name: Berry
berries.description: A delicious and nutritious berry that can be held by a Pokemon. Effects vary.

evolutionary_stones.name: Evolutionary Stone
evolutionary_stones.description: A special stone used to evolve certain species of Pokemon.

incense.name: Incense
incense.description: Emits a scent that attracts specific types of Pokemon.

egg.name: Egg
egg.description: A mysterious egg that may hatch into a Pokemon.

power_items.name: Power Item
power_items.description: A held item that boosts a specific stat during battles.
